data.name: Translation.Translators

data.comment: {0}, {1}, {2}, {3} represent the single version components as numbers.

data.name: Config.WallpaperChangeType.ChangeAll.Description
data.value: Uses different wallpapers for _all monitors on each cycle.

data.name: Config.WallpaperChangeType.ChangeAllCloned.Description
data.value: Uses the _same wallpaper for any monitor on each cycle.

data.name: Config.WallpaperChangeType.ChangeOneByOne.Description
data.value: Changes the wallpaper of only _one monitor on each cycle.

data.name: StateRepresentation.Disabled
data.comment: Used in a context like: "Something: Disabled"

data.name: StateRepresentation.Yes
data.comment: Used in a context like: "Something: Yes"

data.comment: Where the value after this string will either be "StateRepresentation.Enabled" or "StateRepresentation.Disabled".\n(Screenshot: http://codercow.111mb.de/WallpaperManager/Resources/New%20Screenshots/Main.png)

data.name: StatusBar.Selected
data.comment: Where the value after this string will be the number of selected wallpapers.\n(Screenshot: http://codercow.111mb.de/WallpaperManager/Resources/New%20Screenshots/Main.png)

data.name: StatusBar.Wallpapers
data.comment: Where the value after this string will be the the number of wallpapers in list.\n(Screenshot: http://codercow.111mb.de/WallpaperManager/Resources/New%20Screenshots/Main.png)

data.name: ToolButton.AddCategory
data.comment: This is one of the ToolButtons in the upper right corner of the main window so try to keep the translation short.\n(Screenshot: http://codercow.111mb.de/WallpaperManager/Resources/New%20Screenshots/Main.png)

data.name: ToolButton.AddWallpapers
data.comment: This is one of the ToolButtons in the upper right corner of the main window so try to keep the translation short.\n(Screenshot: http://codercow.111mb.de/WallpaperManager/Resources/New%20Screenshots/Main.png)

data.name: ToolTip.AddCategory.Description
data.value: Adds a new Wallpaper Category to the list. (Hotkeys: Ctrl+Q)

data.name: ToolTip.AddCategoryOrSyncFolder.Description
data.value: Adds a new Wallpaper Category to the list. (Hotkeys: Ctrl+Q)

data.name: ToolTip.AddCategoryOrSyncFolder.NoteText
data.value: Hold the Shift-Key to add a Synchronized Folder.

data.name: ToolTip.AddSynchronizedFolder.Description
data.value: Adds a new Synchronized Folder to the list.

data.name: ToolTip.AddSynchronizedFolder.NoteText
data.value: A Synchronized Folder observes a specified directory of the file system for changes and synchronizes its content with the wallpaper list.

data.name: ToolTip.AddWallpaper.Description
data.value: Adds new wallpapers to the list. (Hotkeys: Ctrl+W)

data.name: ToolTip.AddWallpaper.NoteText
data.value: If the selected Wallpaper Category is a Synchronized Folder then the Wallpaper Image will be copied into it.

data.name: ToolTip.AutocycleInterval.Description
data.value: If random cycling is enabled, this value defines the time between each random cycle.

data.name: ToolTip.CategoryConfigureWallpaperDefaultSettings.Description
data.value: Configures the default settings used for wallpapers added to the selected Wallpaper Category.

data.name: ToolTip.CategoryRemove.Description
data.value: Removes the selected Wallpaper Category. (Hotkeys: Delete)

data.name: ToolTip.CategoryRemove.NoteText
data.value: Hold the Shift-Key to remove without confirmation dialog.

data.name: ToolTip.CategoryRename.Description
data.value: Renames the selected Wallpaper Category. (Hotkeys: F2 or Ctrl+R)

data.name: ToolTip.ClickTrayIconAction.Description
data.value: The action to execute whenever the user clicks on a the Tray Icon.

data.name: ToolTip.ClickTrayIconAction.Title
data.value: Single Click on Tray Icon - Action

data.name: ToolTip.ConfigTextOverlays.Description
data.value: Configures Text Overlays that should be displayed before the wallpaper on this monitor.

data.name: ToolTip.ConfigTextOverlays.NoteText
data.value: Text Overlays are applied with the wallpaper to show useful information like the wallpaper's name etc.

data.name: ToolTip.ConfigureWallpapers.Description
data.value: Changes the configuration settings of the selected wallpapers. (Hotkeys: Enter)

data.name: ToolTip.ConfigureWallpapers.Description}
data.value: Removes the selected wallpapers from list. (Hotkey: Delete)

data.name: ToolTip.CycleAfterDisplaySettingsChanged.Description
data.value: If checked, Wallpaper Mananger will immediately perform a random cycle after the Windows Display Settings (like the resolution) have been changed.

data.name: ToolTip.CycleAfterStartup.Description
data.value: If checked, Wallpaper Manager will perform one cycle immediately after it have been started.

data.name: ToolTip.CycleNext.Description
data.value: Applies the next wallpaper on the Windows Desktop. (Hotkeys: F5)

data.name: ToolTip.DisplayCycleTimeAsIconOverlay.Description
data.value: If checked, Wallpaper Manager will show the remaining time for the next random cycle as overlay icon in the Windows Task Bar (Windows 7 only).

data.name: ToolTip.DisplayCycleTimeAsIconOverlay.NoteText
data.value: To make use of this feature, don't close Wallpaper Mananger's main window but minimize it or check the 'Minimize on Close' Box. The icon will only be visible in the Task Bar if you have large icons enabled.

data.name: ToolTip.DisplayCycleTimeAsIconOverlay.Title
data.value: Display Cycle Time as Icon Overlay

data.name: ToolTip.DoubleClickTrayIconAction.Description
data.value: The action to execute whenever the user double clicks on a the Tray Icon.

data.name: ToolTip.DoubleClickTrayIconAction.Title
data.value: Double Click on Tray Icon Action

data.name: ToolTip.DoubleClickWallpaperAction.Description
data.value: The action to execute whenever the user double clicks on a wallpaper entry in the list.

data.name: ToolTip.Global.DragableTextBox.NoteText
data.value: When dragging using the mouse, hold the Shift-Key to drag with a greater value.

data.name: ToolTip.MemorizeLastCycledWPs.Description
data.value: If random cycling is enabled, this value defines how many wallpapers are memorized to prevent them from being cycled over and over again.

data.name: ToolTip.MemorizeLastCycledWPs.NoteText
data.value: For example: If this value is set to 30% and wallpaper A had just been applied then at least 30% of all your wallpapers have to be cycled until wallpaper A can be applied again.

data.name: ToolTip.MinimizeAfterStartup.Description
data.value: If checked, Wallpaper Manager will be started without showing the main window.

data.name: ToolTip.MinimizeOnClose.Description
data.value: If checked, Wallpaper Manager's main window will always be minimized and be shown in the Windows Task Bar even if the close button is clicked.

data.name: ToolTip.MonitorBottomMargin.Description
data.value: Sets a margin from the bottom side of the monitor in pixels where no wallpaper should be applied.

data.name: ToolTip.MonitorCycleRandom.Description
data.value: If checked, Wallpaper Manager will cycle random wallpapers on this monitor.

data.name: ToolTip.MonitorCycleStatic.Description
data.value: If checked, Wallpaper Manager will always keep one static wallpaper on this monitor.

data.name: ToolTip.MonitorLeftMargin.Description
data.value: Sets a margin from the left side of the monitor in pixels where no wallpaper should be applied.

data.name: ToolTip.MonitorRightMargin.Description
data.value: Sets a margin from the right side of the monitor in pixels where no wallpaper should be applied.

data.name: ToolTip.MonitorTopMargin.Description
data.value: Sets a margin from the top side of the monitor in pixels where no wallpaper should be applied.

data.name: ToolTip.MultiscreenWallpaper.Auto.Description
data.value: If selected, Wallpaper Manager will automatically suggest new wallpapers as single- or multiscreen wallpapers.

data.name: ToolTip.MultiscreenWallpaper.No.Description
data.value: If selected, Wallpaper Manager will treat any added wallpaper as singlescreen wallpaper.

data.name: ToolTip.MultiscreenWallpaper.Yes.Description
data.value: If selected, Wallpaper Manager will treat any added wallpaper as multiscreen wallpaper.

data.name: ToolTip.MultiscreenWallpaper.YesNo.Description
data.value: If selected, Wallpaper Manager will place the wallpaper over all monitors.

data.name: ToolTip.OnlyCycleBetweenStart.Description
data.value: This value defines the time of the day when Wallpaper Mananger should start cycling this wallpaper.

data.name: ToolTip.OnlyCycleBetweenStop.Description
data.value: This value defines the time of the day when Wallpaper Mananger should stop cycling this wallpaper.

data.name: ToolTip.OpenWallpapersFolder.Description
data.value: Opens the containing folder of the selected wallpaper(s) in Windows Explorer.

data.name: ToolTip.OverlayTextBorderColor.Description
data.value: The color of the overlay text's border.

data.name: ToolTip.OverlayTextBorderColor.NoteText
data.value: Its recommended to set the Border-Color into a huge contrast difference to the text's color to make sure that the text can be seen on any wallpaper.

data.name: ToolTip.OverlayTextColor.Description
data.value: The color of the overlay text.

data.name: ToolTip.OverlayTextFormat.Description
data.value: The format of the text to be displayed.

data.name: ToolTip.OverlayTextFormat.DescriptionP1
data.value: %WallpaperX% - The filename of the wallpaper (without ext.), where the X is the monitor number.

data.name: ToolTip.OverlayTextFormat.DescriptionP11
data.value: %SystemRuntime% - The time-span since the system is running.<LineBreak />

data.name: ToolTip.OverlayTextFormat.DescriptionP12
data.value: %SystemRuntimeFmt% - The time-span since the system is running formatted. (e.g. 2 hours, 22 minutes)

data.name: ToolTip.OverlayTextFormat.DescriptionP13
data.value: %SystemStartTime% - The time of day when the system started to run.

data.name: ToolTip.OverlayTextFormat.DescriptionP14
data.value: %SystemStartTimeD% - The time and date when the system started to run.

data.name: ToolTip.OverlayTextFormat.DescriptionP15
data.value: %SystemStartTimeDFmt% - The time and date when the system started to run formatted.

data.name: ToolTip.OverlayTextFormat.DescriptionP2
data.value: %WallpaperFileX% - The filename of the wallpaper (with ext.), where the X is the monitor number.

data.name: ToolTip.OverlayTextFormat.DescriptionP3
data.value: %WallpaperPathX% - The full path of the wallpaper, where the X is the monitor number.

data.name: ToolTip.OverlayTextFormat.DescriptionP7
data.value: %DayOfWeek% - The current day of the week.

data.name: ToolTip.OverlayTextFormat.DescriptionP8
data.value: %UserName% - The name of the current logged on user.

data.name: ToolTip.OverlayTextHOffset.Description
data.value: This value moves the text on the horizontal axis by the given pixels.

data.name: ToolTip.OverlayTextVOffset.Description
data.value: This value moves the text on the horizontal axis by the given pixels.

data.name: ToolTip.RemoveWallpapersPhsysically.Description
data.value: Remove the selected wallpapers and their assigned physical image files. (Hotkey: Shift+Delete)

data.name: ToolTip.RemoveWallpapersPhsysically.NoteText
data.value: The images won't be moved to the recycle bin and will be deleted permanently!

data.name: ToolTip.StartAutocyclingAfterStartup.Description
data.value: If checked, Wallpaper Manager will run the autocycling process of wallpapers after startup.

data.name: ToolTip.StartCycling.Description
data.value: Starts the automatic cycling process of wallpapers. (Hotkeys: F3)

data.name: ToolTip.StartWithWindows.Description
data.value: If checked, Wallpaper Manager will start after the current user logged into his/her Windows account.

data.name: ToolTip.StartWithWindows.NoteText
data.value: No access rights to read the registry value.
data.comment: Only displayed if an error occurred while determining the value.

data.name: ToolTip.StopCycling.Description
data.value: Stops the automatic cycling process of wallpapers. (Hotkeys: F4)

data.name: ToolTip.TerminateAfterStartup.Description
data.value: If checked, Wallpaper Manager will automatically close itself after it has been started.

data.name: ToolTip.TerminateAfterStartup.NoteText
data.value: Wallpaper Manager will wait about 5 seconds before closing. The 5 seconds timer can be aborted by performing any action, like clicking the Tray Icon.

data.name: ToolTip.UseAsWallpaper.Description
data.value: Apply the selected wallpapers on the Windows Desktop.

data.name: ToolTip.WallpaperBackgroundColor.Description
data.value: The color which is displayed behind the image.

data.name: ToolTip.WallpaperCycleOnScreen.Description
data.value: Check to allow cycling of this wallpaper on this screen.

data.name: ToolTip.WallpaperCycleOnScreen.NoteText
data.value: This feature is disabled because the Wallpaper Cycling Mode is set to Clone All Monitors.

data.name: ToolTip.WallpaperHFlip.Description
data.value: If checked, the wallpaper will be flipped horizontally when cycled.

data.name: ToolTip.WallpaperHOffset.Description
data.value: This value moves the wallpaper on the horizontal axis by the given pixels.

data.name: ToolTip.WallpaperHScale.Description
data.value: This value scales the wallpaper on the horizontal axis by the given percentage.

data.name: ToolTip.WallpaperImageLoadError.Description
data.value: An error occurred when trying to read the wallpaper's image.

data.name: ToolTip.WallpaperImagePath.NoteText
data.value: Right-Click on the button to remove the wallpaper-image.

data.name: ToolTip.WallpaperMirrorBottom.Description
data.value: If checked, the wallpaper will have a mirror of iteself on its bottom side when cycled.

data.name: ToolTip.WallpaperMirrorLeft.Description
data.value: If checked, the wallpaper will have a mirror of iteself on its left side when cycled.

data.name: ToolTip.WallpaperMirrorRight.Description
data.value: If checked, the wallpaper will have a mirror of iteself on its right side when cycled.

data.name: ToolTip.WallpaperMirrorTop.Description
data.value: If checked, the wallpaper will have a mirror of iteself on its top side when cycled.

data.name: ToolTip.WallpaperPlacement.Auto.Description
data.value: If selected, Wallpaper Manager will automatically suggest a placement-mode for the new wallpaper.

data.name: ToolTip.WallpaperPriority.Description
data.value: When cycling randomly, this value defines how often the wallpaper is picked.

data.name: ToolTip.WallpaperVFlip.Description
data.value: If checked, the wallpaper will be flipped vertically when cycled.

data.name: ToolTip.WallpaperVOffset.Description
data.value: This value moves the wallpaper on the vertical axis by the given pixels.

data.name: ToolTip.WallpaperVScale.Description
data.value: This value scales the wallpaper on the vertical axis by the given percentage.

data.name: WallpaperData.Multiscreen
data.comment: Where the value after this string will either be "StateRepresentation.Yes" or "StateRepresentation.No".\n(Screenshot: http://codercow.111mb.de/WallpaperManager/Resources/New%20Screenshots/Main.png)

data.name: WallpaperData.Placement
data.comment: Where the value after this string will be the placement of the wallpaper. (See: WallpaperPlacement.*)\n(Screenshot: http://codercow.111mb.de/WallpaperManager/Resources/New%20Screenshots/Main.png)

data.name: WallpaperData.Priority
data.comment: Where the value after this string will be the priority number of the wallpaper.\n(Screenshot: http://codercow.111mb.de/WallpaperManager/Resources/New%20Screenshots/Main.png)

data.name: Dialog.Category.AddNew.Description
data.value: Please enter the name of the new category below.

data.name: Dialog.Category.AddSynchronizedFolder.Description
data.value: Please enter the name of the new synchronized folder below.

data.name: Dialog.Category.Delete.Description1
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete
data.comment: Please keep the whitespace at the end.

data.name: Dialog.Category.Delete.Description2
data.value: and all its containing wallpaper entries?
data.comment: Please keep the whitespace at the start.

data.name: Dialog.Category.NameInvalid.Description1
data.value: The name is invalid because it contains one or more of the following invalid characters:
data.comment: Don't translate the characters to their representations which may be used in your language.\nPlease keep the whitespace at the end.

data.name: Dialog.Category.NameInvalid.Description2
data.value: \"[\", \"]\", line breaks, control characters and tabs.

data.name: Dialog.Category.NameInvalidLength.Description
data.value: The name is invalid. It has to be at least {0} and at most {1} characters long.

data.name: Dialog.Category.NoCategoryAvailable.Description
data.value: There are no categories available. Do you want to create a new category now?
data.comment: Shown when the user attempts to add an wallpaper and there is no category in the list.

data.name: Dialog.Category.NoCategoryAvailable.Title
data.comment: Shown when the user attempts to add an wallpaper and there is no category in the list.

data.name: Dialog.Category.NoCategorySelected.Description
data.value: You have to select a category from the list first.

data.name: Dialog.Category.Rename.Description
data.value: Please enter the new name of the category below.

data.name: Dialog.Category.SelectSynchronizedFolder.Description
data.value: Please select the folder which should be watched for changes.

data.name: Dialog.Category.SynchronizedFolderFileAlreadyExist.Description1
data.comment: Where the value after this string will be the full path of the related file.\nPlease keep the whitespace at the end.

data.name: Dialog.Category.SynchronizedFolderFileAlreadyExist.Description2
data.value: does already exist in the synchronized folder.\n\nDo you want to overwrite the existing file?
data.comment: Where the value before this string will be the full path of the related file.\nPlease keep the whitespace at the start.

data.name: Dialog.Category.SynchronizedFolderNotObservable.Description1
data.comment: Where the value after this string will be the full path of the related directory.

data.name: Dialog.Category.SynchronizedFolderNotObservable.Description2
data.value: is not observable because it could not be found.
data.comment: Where the value before this string will be the full path of the related directory.

data.name: Dialog.Config.ReadError.Description2Alt1
data.value: could not be loaded because it was not found.

data.name: Dialog.Config.ReadError.Description2Alt2
data.value: could not be loaded because it has an invalid file format.

data.name: Dialog.Config.ReadError.Description3
data.value: The default configuration settings will be used instead.

data.name: Dialog.Config.WriteError.Description1
data.comment: Where the value after this string will be the full path of the related file.\nPlease keep the whitespace at the end.

data.name: Dialog.Config.WriteError.Description2
data.value: could not be written. Make sure Wallpaper Mananger has sufficient rights to access this path.
data.comment: Where the value before this string will be the full path of the related file. Please keep the whitespace at the start.

data.name: Dialog.Cycle.InvalidSelection.Description
data.value: You have to select one or more singlescreen or exactly one multiscreen wallpaper.

data.name: Dialog.Cycle.MissingWallpapers.Description1
data.value: More wallpapers are required to cycle.

data.name: Dialog.Cycle.MissingWallpapers.Description2
data.value: There should be at least 1 activated multiscreen or {0} activated singlescreen wallpapers in the list.

data.name: Dialog.Cycle.MissingWallpapers.Description3
data.value: There should be at least one activated wallpaper in the list.

data.name: Dialog.Error.AlreadyRunning.Description
data.value: Another instance of Wallpaper Manager is already running.

data.name: Dialog.Error.AppDataDirectoryCreation.Description2
data.value: could not be created. Make sure Wallpaper Mananger has sufficient rights to access it.

data.name: Dialog.Error.DirectoryLoadingNotSupported.Description
data.value: Loading of directories is not supported by Wallpaper Manager yet.

data.name: Dialog.Error.DirectoryLoadingNotSupported.Title
data.value: Loading of Directories is not Supported

data.name: Dialog.Error.DirectoryNotFound.AltDescription
data.value: A requested directory could either not be found or this program does not have the required rights to access it.

data.name: Dialog.Error.DirectoryNotFound.Description1
data.comment: Please keep the whitespace at the end.

data.name: Dialog.Error.DirectoryNotFound.Description2
data.value: could either not be found or this program does not have the required rights to access it.
data.comment: Please keep the whitespace at the start.

data.name: Dialog.Error.FileInUse.AltDescription

data.name: Dialog.Error.FileInUse.Description1
data.comment: Please keep the whitespace at the end.

data.name: Dialog.Error.FileInUse.Description2
data.value: is in use by another program.
data.comment: Please keep the whitespace at the start.

data.name: Dialog.Error.FileNotFound.AltDescription

data.name: Dialog.Error.FileNotFound.Description1
data.comment: Please keep the whitespace at the end.

data.name: Dialog.Error.FileNotFound.Description2

data.name: Dialog.Error.Global.ExceptionDetailsInfo

data.name: Dialog.Error.MissingFileSystemRights.Description2

data.name: Dialog.Error.MissingFrameworkRights.Description
data.value: Wallpaper Manager is missing .NET Framework rights to perform the requested operation.

data.name: Dialog.Error.OutOfMemory.Description
data.value: There is not enough memory for this operation available.

data.name: Dialog.Error.UnhandledException.Description
data.value: Wallpaper Manager {0} encountered an unhandled exception, see Exception Details for more information.

data.name: Dialog.Update.Available.Description2

data.name: Dialog.Update.Available.Description3
data.comment: Please keep the whitespace at the end.

data.name: Dialog.Update.FileNotFound.Description1
data.value: There was no update file found on the server.

data.name: Dialog.Update.FileNotFound.Description2
data.value: Do you want to open the website now to install the update manually?

data.name: Dialog.Update.NoUpdateAvailable.Description
data.value: This is the latest version of this application.

data.name: Dialog.Update.UnableToConnect.Description1
data.value: The update server did not respond to the request.

data.name: Dialog.Update.UnableToConnect.Title
data.value: Unable to Connect with the Update Server

data.name: Dialog.Wallpaper.DeletePhysically.Description
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete the selected wallpapers from your hard disk?

data.name: Dialog.Wallpaper.DeletePhysically.NoteText
data.value: The image(s) are not moved to the recycle bin and will be deleted permanently.

data.name: Dialog.Wallpaper.DisabledScreensAndCloneAllCycleMode.Description
data.value: You've configured that some of your wallpapers should not be cycled on some of your monitors. Note that this settings are ignored when using the \"Clone All Monitors\" cycle mode.

data.name: Dialog.Wallpaper.DisabledScreensAndCloneAllCycleMode.Title
data.value: Disabled Screens and Clone All Monitors - Mode

data.name: Dialog.Wallpaper.ImageFormatError.Description
data.value: The image file has an invalid or unsupported file format.

data.name: Dialog.Wallpaper.MultiscreenOnDisabledScreens.Description
data.value: A multiscreen wallpaper can't have cycling disabled on a single monitor and has to be always applied on all monitors.

data.name: Dialog.Wallpaper.NoneSelected.Description
data.value: You have to select at least one wallpaper from the list.

data.name: ToolTip.Global.MultiscreenFeature.NoteText
data.value: This feature is only available for multi screen systems.

data.name: About.HelpTranslating
data.value: Help translating Wallpaper Manager on Launchpad

data.name: OverlayTextData.DefaultFormat
data.comment: The format string used for a newly created text overlay.
